hero.title: time to explore
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic India on guided Royal Enfield motorcycle tours

discover.label: Discover
discover.title: Southern India
discover.text1: From the lush backwaters of Kerala to the vibrant beaches of Goa, Southern India is a rider's paradise. Our guided tours take you through winding mountain roads, ancient temples, and aromatic spice plantations.
discover.text2: Experience the true essence of India, moving at a pace that allows you to absorb every detail. This isn't just a motorcycle tour; it's a journey into the soul of a culture.

founders.label: The Founders
founders.title: Jo & Pratish
founders.text: Slow Moto Tours was born from a shared passion for exploration, motorcycles, and the rich tapestry of Indian life. Jo and Pratish believe in "Slow Travel" – the art of taking it all in, one mile at a time.
list: 15+ years of experience leading tours in India.
Expert knowledge of local routes and hidden gems.
Deep commitment to sustainable and respectful tourism.

map.label: Our Area
map.title: RIDERS PARADISE
map.text: From Kochi to Goa, we've mapped out the most scenic, soulful, and satisfying routes for any rider.

bottomContent.title: Discover the Magic of Southern India with Slow Moto Tours
bottomContent.text: Are you ready for an unforgettable adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of Southern India?
bottomContent.cta: Discover the Beauty and Thrills of Your Motorbike Holidays
